TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Reuven_Rivlin, title = Reuven_Rivlin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reuven_Rivlin} }

S.FORM: Reuven Rivlin kakilimaan misiwkay tu tademaw nu ihekalay a kanatal nilacul nalecuhan ciniza i 9 a bulad 9 a demiad 1939 a mihcaan, Reuven Rivlin, u misingkiway a tademaw. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Israel ayza sa ci Reuven Rivlin, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihcaan 7 a bulad 24 a demiad. u Iserael a kanatal sa, saicelangay a kanatal kuyni.

Reoven Rivlin kakilimaan misiwkay to tademaw no ihekalay a kanatal nilacol nalecohan ciniza i 9 a bolad 9 a demiad 1939 a mihcaan, Reoven Rivlin, o misingkiway a tademaw. o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Israel ayza sa ci Reoven Rivlin, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihcaan 7 a bolad 24 a demiad. o Iserael a kanatal sa, saicelangay a kanatal koyni.
